New Records: Pathum Nissanka scored 216 runs averaging 43.2 per match in the last 5 matches.
Wanindu Hasaranga took 7 wickets averaging 14.4 per match in the last 3 matches.
Key Match Events: Charith Asalanka was the Man of the Match in the first game of the series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Kandy, allows good stroke play and is not very helpful for bowlers.
Moderate rain is expected, which may affect playing conditions.
